trans-unit.source: Represents a nonexistent value.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en ikke-eksisterende verdi.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The DBNull class represents a nonexistent value.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DBNull representerer en ikke-eksisterende verdi.

trans-unit.source: In a database, for example, a column in a row of a table might not contain any data whatsoever.
trans-unit.target: I en database, for eksempel en kolonne i en rad i en tabell kan ikke inneholde noen art data.

trans-unit.source: That is, the column is considered to not exist at all instead of merely not having a value.
trans-unit.target: Det vil si anses kolonnen finnes ikke i stedet for å bare ikke ha en verdi i det hele tatt.

trans-unit.source: A DBNull object represents the nonexistent column.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for DBNull representerer ikke-eksisterende kolonne.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, COM interop uses the DBNull class to distinguish between a VT_NULL variant, which indicates a nonexistent value, and a VT_EMPTY variant, which indicates an unspecified value.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg bruker COM interop klassen DBNull for å skille mellom en VT_NULL variant, som angir en verdi som ikke finnes, og en VT_EMPTY variant, som angir en angitt verdi.

trans-unit.source: The DBNull type is a singleton class, which means only one DBNull object exists.
trans-unit.target: DBNull-typen er en singleton-klasse, noe som betyr at det finnes bare én DBNull-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> member represents the sole DBNull object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>medlem representerer det eneste objektet DBNull.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>can be used to explicitly assign a nonexistent value to a database field, although most ADO.NET data providers automatically assign values of DBNull when a field does not have a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>kan brukes til å tilordne en ikke-eksisterende verdi eksplisitt til et databasefelt, selv om de fleste ADO.NET-dataleverandørene tilordne verdier av DBNull automatisk når et felt ikke har en gyldig verdi.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a value retrieved from a database field is a DBNull value by passing the value of that field to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå om en verdi som er hentet fra en databasefeltet er DBNull verdien ved å sende verdien for dette feltet, og den `DBNull.Value.Equals` metoden.

trans-unit.source: However, some languages and database objects supply methods that make it easier to determine whether the value of a database field is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid oppgi enkelte språk og databaseobjekter metoder som gjør det enklere å finne ut om verdien for en databasefeltet <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the <xref:System.Data.DataTableReader.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and the <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Disse omfatter Visual Basic `IsDBNull` -funksjonen, den <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, den <xref:System.Data.DataTableReader.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, og <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTableReader.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse the notion of `null` in an object-oriented programming language with a DBNull object.
trans-unit.target: Ikke forveksle innstillinger for `null` i et objektorientert programmeringsspråk med et DBNull-objekt.

trans-unit.source: In an object-oriented programming language, `null` means the absence of a reference to an object.
trans-unit.target: I et objektorientert programmeringsspråk, `null` betyr at det ikke finnes en referanse til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: DBNull represents an uninitialized variant or nonexistent database column.
trans-unit.target: DBNull representerer en ikke-initialisert variant eller ikke-eksisterende databasekolonne.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"> </xref> grensesnittet og returnerer dataene som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object containing information required to serialize the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet som inneholder informasjonen som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object containing the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objektet som inneholder kilde og mål for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.TypeCode> value for <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.TypeCode>verdi <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref>.</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TypeCode> value for <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>, which is <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TypeCode>verdi <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref>, som <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Converts the current <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer gjeldende <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> objektet til den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: Three conversions are supported: If the `type` parameter specifies <xref:System.Object> or <xref:System.DBNull>, the return value is the current <xref:System.DBNull> object itself.
trans-unit.target: Tre konverteringer støttes: Hvis den `type` parameteren angir <xref:System.Object>eller <xref:System.DBNull>, er returverdien gjeldende <xref:System.DBNull>selve objektet.</xref:System.DBNull> </xref:System.DBNull> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the `type` parameter specifies <xref:System.String>, the return value is the string returned by the <xref:System.DBNull.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `type` parameteren angir <xref:System.String>, er returverdien strengen som returneres av den <xref:System.DBNull.ToString%2A>metoden.</xref:System.DBNull.ToString%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the current <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> object to.
trans-unit.target: Typen til å konvertere gjeldende <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface and is used to augment the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.IFormatProvider>grensesnittet og brukes til å utvide konverteringen.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is specified, format information is obtained from the current culture.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> er angitt, formatinformasjonen hentes fra gjeldende kultur.

trans-unit.source: The boxed equivalent of the current <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> object, if that conversion is supported; otherwise, an exception is thrown and no value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende boks tilsvarer <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> objektet, hvis den konverteringen er støttes; ellers, et unntak, og ingen verdier returneres.

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported for the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringen støttes ikke for den <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringen støttes ikke for den <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string (<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en tom streng (<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>).

trans-unit.source: An empty string (<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: En tom streng (<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>).

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string using the specified <xref:System.IFormatProvider?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en tom streng ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.IFormatProvider?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to be used to format the return value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IFormatProvider>som skal brukes til å formatere returverdien.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to obtain the format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ikke hente informasjon om filformat fra gjeldende ID for nasjonal innstilling av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: An empty string (<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: En tom streng (<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>).

trans-unit.source: Represents the sole instance of the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den eneste forekomsten av den <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DBNull> is a singleton class, which means only this instance of this class can exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DBNull>er en singleton-klasse, noe som betyr denne forekomsten av denne klassen kan finnes.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: If a database field has missing data, you can use the Value property to explicitly assign a <xref:System.DBNull> object value to the field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en databasefeltet mangler data, kan du bruke egenskapen Value eksplisitt tildele en <xref:System.DBNull>objekt verdien til feltet.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: However, most data providers do this automatically.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid gjøre de fleste dataleverandørene dette automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To evaluate database fields to determine whether their values are <xref:System.DBNull>, you can pass the field value to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method.
trans-unit.target: Ikke evaluere databasefelt for å fastsette om verdiene er <xref:System.DBNull>, kan du sende feltverdien som den `DBNull.Value.Equals` metoden.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: However, this method is rarely used because there are a number of other ways to evaluate a database field for missing data.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes sjelden fordi det er et antall andre måter å evaluere databasefeltet mangler data.

trans-unit.source: These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the <xref:System.Data.DataTableReader.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and several other methods.
trans-unit.target: Disse omfatter Visual Basic `IsDBNull` -funksjonen, den <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, den <xref:System.Data.DataTableReader.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, den <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og flere andre metoder.</xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTableReader.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
